msg: Backport r178650 from trunk, disable poll only on Mac OS X < 10.4.

author: pquerna
msg: Backport r178650 from trunk, disable poll only on Mac OS X < 10.4.

author: pquerna
msg: Disable poll() only on Mac OS X < 10.4.  Before 10.4, poll was emulated using select, and if it is bound by the limits of select, we want to use select ourselves.
